title: Participating in community decision-making processes
content:
Scenario: Participating in community decision-making processes
    Given the city is planning a new accessible park
    And community input is being gathered
    When Jordan participates in the planning process
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan access the input process
    And Jordan's preferences about park features are gathered accessibly
    And Jordan's input is valued equally with other community members
    And the community_elohim ensures Jordan's voice is heard
    And park design reflects input from diverse community members including IDD
    And Jordan experiences being an active citizen shaping community
    And Jordan's participation strengthens democratic processes
